newsArray.title: IND vs AUS 1st Test: রাত পোহালেই ভারত-অজি দ্বৈরথ, কোথায়-কখন-কীভাবে দেখা যাবে...
creator: TV9 Bangla
newsArray.description: IND vs AUS 1st Test Telecast: প্রথম টেস্টে তাঁর পাশাপাশি পাওয়া যাবে না শুভমন গিলকেও। ভারতকে নেতৃত্ব দেবেন জসপ্রীত বুমরা। অস্ট্রেলিয়ার ক্যাপ্টেন প্যাট কামিন্স। নেতৃত্বের দিক থেকে অনেকটাই অভিজ্ঞ কামিন্স। দুই পেসার-ক্যাপ্টেনের উপভোগ্য লড়াই দেখার অপেক্ষা।

newsArray.title: No Compromise On Champions Trophy: PCB Stands Firm, Reaffirms Opposition To Hybrid Model - Details Inside
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: The deadlock over ICC Champions Trophy 2025 continues. Pakistan, the tournament's host, insists that all teams, including India, play all their matches exclusively in Pakistan. However, the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has reportedly maintained its stance of not sending the Indian team to Pakistan for the tournament, suggesting organizing the event in a hybrid model.Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB), in a recent media release, announced a new development regarding the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. The board appointed Mr. Sumair Ahmad Syed, Chief Operating Officer of PCB, as the Tournament Director for the event.Also on ABP Live | Shoaib Akhtar's Latest Statement On IND-PAK Champions Trophy Situation Will SHOCK YouIn the announcement, PCB reaffirmed its stance of hosting all matches of Champions Trophy 2025 exclusively in Pakistan, leaving ICC with the responsibility of finding a resolution to this ongoing deadlock.On Sumair's appointment, PCB chairman Mohsin Naqvi said:"Sumair is an exceptionally organised professional with a wealth of administrative expertise. Coupled with his unwavering passion for cricket, I am confident he will deliver an unforgettable ICC Champions Trophy 2025 for players, officials and fans alike."The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 promises to showcase Pakistan's ability to host world-class cricketing events, welcoming players and fans from around the globe to experience the country's passion for the game and renowned hospitality."This tournament marks a historic milestone as the biggest sporting event in Pakistan's recent history. With Sumair leading the way, the global cricket community can rest assured that the event will meet the highest standards of excellence synonymous with Pakistan."Sharing his views, Tournament Director Sumair Ahmad Syed said:"I am deeply honored and excited to take on this significant responsibility for a tournament that holds immense importance for the Pakistan Cricket Board, our fans and supporters. Preparations are already well underway, with stadium upgrades nearing completion and crucial discussions ongoing with the International Cricket Council."Our experienced events team, which has successfully planned and executed nine multi-team HBL Pakistan Super Leagues, including last five in Pakistan, will play a vital role in ensuring the tournament's success."I am committed to working closely with them as well as the International Cricket Council, leaving no stone unturned to exceed the benchmarks set by previous ICC Champions Trophy editions."

newsArray.title: Former Pakistan cricketer Muhammad Nazir passes away
creator: PTI
newsArray.description: Karachi, Nov 21 (PTI) Former Pakistan cricketer and umpire, Muhammad Nazir junior passed away in his hometown of Lahore on Thursday after prolonged illness. He was 78. Nazir, who had given some torrid time to West Indian legend Viv Richards with his off-spin, was bed-ridden for the last few months, Noman Nazir, his son, confirmed. [...]

newsArray.title: India vs Australia Dream11 Prediction: Fantasy Cricket Tips For IND vs AUS 1st Test Match In Perth
creator: Rishav Narang
newsArray.description: India will take on Australia in the first Test of the Border-Gavaksar Trophy at the Optus Stadium in Perth from November 22 to 26. Jasprit Bumrah will lead the visiting team. Pat Cummins will lead Australia in a home Test series against India for the first time.

newsArray.title: 'ऑस्ट्रेलिया में मिली चुनौती को गले लगाओ...मौके को भुनाओ मेरे भाई'
creator: News18 Hindi
newsArray.description: देवदत्त पडिक्कल को पर्थ में खेले जाने वाले पहले टेस्ट मैच में मौका मिल सकता है. शुभमन गिल के चोटिल होने के बाद पडिक्कल तीसरे नंबर पर उतर सकते हैं. पडिक्कल के सीनियर साथी मयंक अग्रवाल का कहना है कि ऑस्ट्रेलिया में जो भी चुनौती सामने आएगी उसके लिए पडिक्कल को तैयार रहना होगा और मौके को दोनों हाथों से लपकना होगा.
